title: "Voice of the Heartland Award Goes to Louise Erdrich"
excerpt: "Louise Erdrich is this year's recipient of the Voice of the Heartland Award. Sponsored by the Great Lakes Independent Booksellers Association and the Midwest Independent Booksellers Association, the honor is given \"in recognition of individuals and organizations who uphold the value of independent bookselling and have made a significant contribution to bookselling in the Midwest."
